name: Abram
bio: Hi, my name is Abram Pond-Johnson. This is my first time doing robotics. I’m not a coder, but that is my second job for the most part. I have been doing the portfolio which has been pretty fun making. This is not my ideal version of what I want to do, but I’m still having fun and ready to try to win! :)

name: Brandon
bio: I coded this website with styling from Abram.

name: Dane
bio: I am the lead build guy for our team and the designer of our robot i basically fix all of the small problems and know our robot inside.

name: Gage
bio: Gage Penicillin likes Canadian United Media, Tennis and Fingerboarding, hanging out with friends and playing video games. I am new to robotics but I am enjoying it by building part of our robot.

name: Hayden
bio: Hayden here, I’m tired. I have to work for two teams at once and it's okay(professional gratios professionalist). I am a lead web designer in one group and in the other I make these. I also find myself sitting around and reading a book.

name: Isaac Lee
bio: Hello, my name is Isaac and I am a part of the rocket robotics program and part of the robotics team Say Watt. I have been doing robotics for two years now and really enjoy it. I like the color orange. I play soccer and cello and I go to robotics meetings. I like building this robot with my colleagues Dane, Grae and Gage as well as our coders and web designers Ismael, Brandon, Abram and Hayden.

name: Ismael
bio: I am Ismael, I am the lead coder on our team, technically I am the only java coder so when the robot moves I know I did it.
